name.en: Special Studies on Topics about Molecular Science and Technology I
name.ch: 分子科學與技術專題研究I

notice.en: MST program. Only students of the MST can take the course. The actual class time will be set by the lecturer.
notice.ch: 限中研院國際研究生院MST學程學生修習。實際上課時間，依任課老師規定。中研院原分所R311

remark.ch: 限中研院國際研究生院MST學程學生修習。實際上課時間，依任課老師規定。中研院原分所R311
remark.en: MST program. Only students of the MST can take the course. The actual class time will be set by the lecturer.

goal.ch: 讓學生進行lab. rotation以順利找定論文指導教授。
goal.en:
"For first year students (enrolled in 2016 and after 2016)
Do research on current topics of Molecular Science and Technology, mainly do laboratory rotations in the first 2 semesters (2 - 4 labs each semester)"

gradMethod.ch: 學生口頭或書面報告再由lab rotation老師給分

en.competencies: Advanced knowledge in the research subfield

ch: 系所:限物理學系碩士班、物理學系博士班。
en: Department:MSc  in Physics、PhD in Physics only.
